author: Craft Computing
description:
Thanks to Meter for sponsoring today's episode. If you're interested in learning more about how Meter can help with your IT Infrastructure, go to https://meter.com/CraftComputing to book a demo today.

Welcome to Talking Heads, your once weekly show about everything happening in the world of Homelab, Servers, craft beer and cocktails.

Check out this episode in Podcast form over at https://open.spotify.com/show/31ZxkU6RwPHG8A4jQjxSG3

Support us on Patreon and get access to our exclusive Discord server. Chat with all of the hosts from Talking Heads all week long.

Want to fuel Craft Computing?  Parts, beer, gifts? I've got a mailbox!

Salem, OR 97304

On tonight's show...

- Tech News - 

Sipeed Nano KVM has a hidden microphone?

title: Sipeed KVM has a hidden microphone! Toilet Cameras were a bad idea - Talking Heads Ep.412

author: Craft Computing
description:
Thanks to Meter for sponsoring this episode! Go to http://meter.com/craftcomputing to book a demo today.

Grab yourself a Pint Glass or Insulated Coffee Tumbler at https://craftcomputing.store

I have a growing problem, in that I'm constantly running out of space in my server rack. With two 64-Core AMD Epyc virtualization hosts, a Supermicro Microcloud X79 8-Node chassis, and a pair of 45Drives Storinators, it's no wonder I'm out of room. Today, I'm consolidating my NAS servers down into a single server, and also dramatically expanding my storage to a full 328TB!

*Links to items below may be affiliate links for which I may be compensated*

- Name Suggestions Welcome for the new NAS -
AMD Threadripper 9970X: https://amzn.to/45ftroj
ASUS Pro WS TRX50 -SAGE WiFi CEB: https://amzn.to/4lhF9oD
G.Skill G5 Neo 4x32GB 6400 ECC: https://amzn.to/3Jj2h8H
Intel 3D XPoint 16GB Optane Boot Drive: https://ebay.us/XMuv2c
Supermicro 846 24-Bay Chassis: https://ebay.us/rCA4eb
Mellanox MCX455A-ECAT Conn
title: Homelab Rack Rebuild 2026 - 328TB NAS Upgrade!
